name: Build & Battle (itch)
description:
*Windows and Linux files now available*

The concept of this game is that you have ten seconds between every wave to build up your kingdom's defenses and money. Pick between two difficulties and see how long you can survive!  (My high-score is 70 sec normal difficulty)

WARNING: This game is very broken as I started a day late in the jam and well, this is my first game jam ever, as well as my first ever game published on Itch.io. Thanks for understanding, I am 12 after all.

Bugs: Sometimes enemies will spawn and do nothing; but thats good for you I guess? (Nav_mesh wont bake lol)  Also sometimes you will still have some land left yet its game over; just gotta hope it wont happen XD

Items in game rn: 

  • Land: Buy yourself a square of land under your rule!
  • Trading Posts: Gain 2x the money on that tile!
  • Bar: Bring in the taxes! (1.2x Money per sec)
  • Watch Tower: Defend your land from the tiny... red squares?

Made with Unity for the Geta Game Jam #3
